description: Number of n-step polygons on Kagome lattice.
references: M. E. Fisher and M. F. Sykes, Excluded-volume problem and the Ising model of ferromagnetism, Phys. Rev. 114 (1959), 45-58.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
